definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
(bird species of China) common whitethroat (Sylvia communis)

sentences.english: Results Macroscopically, the tumor appeared as a hard grayish-white mass.
sentences.chinese: 结果大体检查肿瘤呈质硬灰白色肿块。

sentences.english: The towering cloud is circular. It is surrounded by hazy, gray-white smoke.
sentences.chinese: 堆起的云团呈圆形，其被模糊的灰白色烟雾所笼罩。

sentences.english: Her ashen face show how much news have shocked her.
sentences.chinese: 她灰白的脸显示橱徘消息使听多么震惊。

sentences.english: He is an old man with gray temples.
sentences.chinese: 他是个鬓发灰白的老人。

sentences.english: She had black hair, graying at the temples.
sentences.chinese: 她一头黑发，鬓角处开始变灰白了。

sentences.english: Manganese is a hard, brittle, gray-white metal.
sentences.chinese: 锰是一种灰白色的，又硬又脆的金属。

sentences.english: He looks grey, owlish , bespectacled, and glum.
sentences.chinese: 他头发灰白，戴着眼镜，显得严肃和阴郁。

sentences.english: His hair is dry, dull and grey.
sentences.chinese: 他灰白的头发又干又无光泽。

sentences.english: Large dark green lanes, there are gray stone miscellaneous flaws, resulting in the Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 大体呈墨绿，杂有灰白石瑕，产生于汉代。

sentences.english: White or off-white color powder inside the capsule.
sentences.chinese: 胶囊内药粉为白色或灰白色粉末。

sentences.english: He squeezed the steering wheel until his knuckles turned ash- gray.
sentences.chinese: 他的手狠狠地攥着方向盘，指节都变成了灰白色。

sentences.english: Brown Ben scratched at his speckled grey-and-white whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 棕色的本挠了挠他斑灰白斑驳的胡须。

sentences.english: Dark green swells, slate-gray in the troughs, rolled in from a heaving horizon.
sentences.chinese: 一排排暗绿色的大浪带着灰白的浪花从远处滚滚而来。

sentences.english: The Lieutenant - Colonel Miranda was a short, gray-faced man, who had been in the army all his life .
sentences.chinese: 米兰达中校是个脸色灰白的矮子，一生都在军界。

sentences.english: He was rather elderly with grey hair and clear blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他上了年纪，有着灰白的头发和明亮的蓝眼睛。

sentences.english: His head was bald, with the exception of two graying tufts of hair that arced behind his ears.
sentences.chinese: 秃顶，只在耳后有一圈灰白头发。

definition: Qingbaijiang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
to be suffused with white/to be discolored/to blanch
